description:
What Does Career Advancement Really Mean?  How Do You Effectively Grow Your Career?  How Do You Get Noticed?


The career advancement training course, "From Invisible to Invincible: Career Advancement Success" will help you to get out of the shadows and take charge of your career.  This training course will cover:

  • The true meaning of career advancement.  Hint: It doesn't always mean, "moving up the ranks".
  • Why self-assessment is an important piece of your career advancement journey.
  • The common mistakes that many make that derail their career advancement and how you can avoid these traps.
  • How you can take charge of your career by taking ownership and taking action.
  • How perceptions that your colleagues and managers have of you can stall your career - or, make your career aspirations come grinding it to a halt.
  • How everyday cultural influences can curtail your career advancement - and how to prevent this from happening.
  • What managers really look for when theyâ€™re ready to groom and promote their staff, versus what you think they're looking for - and how to use this knowledge to your advantage.
  • Actionable and proven tips and strategies for job seekers and employees alike that will take you from 'invisible' to 'invincible' and jump start your career trajectory.
  • And there's even more practical insights that can be gleaned from this self-directed career training course...

The Proof Is In The Pudding! Here's What Participants Think About My Career Advancement Training Course:

Howard Chan

A Great Refreshing New Perspective on Career Advancement
This is really a great course for everyone who wants to advance in their careers. I always thought that career success is always about climbing the corporate ladder but after this course, I realized that it's really all about taking opportunities that suit you best... not necessarily being paid more or getting to be called "Sir" by everyone in the workplace. Thank you for this lecture.. really helps in understanding how to approach each and every career opportunity.

Pamela Jean

In a Career Transition
Forced to look outside my chosen profession for employment, I am in the process of getting a PMP certification, to better position myself in the marketplace. I feel well equipped and more at ease after taking this course. One of many key things for me was taking the time to fill out the "Self-Assessment" download that the instructor provides. My goals are clear now and I feel confident that I'll achieve them!

Edward Lee

Each lecture was extremely informative. I was able to get added insight regarding issues that I'm already aware of. I viewed all thirteen lectures and there are two sections that I concentrated on specifically, such as  #4-Pitfalls That Stall Your Career Advancement and #6-What You Should Know - Tips From An HR Insider. Overall, I am very impressed with the wealth of information given in this series regarding today's workplace.

Josephine L. Corbin

Course Utilization
This course is concise, to the point, and written at a level that those wishing to further their careers can walk away armed with precise knowledge. Based on the number of people who have been unemployed this course would be a great training tool that could (and should) be utilized somehow in career centers such as Job Net.
title: From Invisible to Invincible - Career Advancement Success
